Summary: Flashing bright lights that move around on the mountain.

divs: Sighting DetailsThe first time i saw the lights was a year ago when i would see them from my driveway while having a smoke. I first noticed a single bright flashing light that would light up on the mountain then once i would watch for a while i seen multiple lights that would move around the mountain . these lights are yellow white lights that flash very bright then go out then light up again repeatadly doing this while being in different places every time they flash up . a lot of people i hang out with have seen them. these lights could not be a star because there on the mountain and it couldnt be a fire so i dont know what it is. you can sit for hours and watch the lights are they will be flashing for probably all night . if you live in mount shasta and want to see the lights then look up at the mountain on a clear night late at night and look at the mountain for a while and you might see something amazing (note: i still see these lights a lot and just seen them the other night where me and my brother seen four parrelel lights flash up on the mountain then go out
